Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Prohibits the obscuring of body-worn or stationary cameras in correctional institutions
Summary: Prohibits employees of the department of corrections and community supervision or a correctional facility from willfully obstructing, blocking or otherwise obscuring a body-worn or stationary camera from recording activities within a correctional facility.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to prohibiting the obscuring of body-worn or stationary cameras in correctional institutions
